vlive.korean: 그런 거를 이렇게 표현한 것 같아요 - 그런 걸 표현했다고요? And that scene describes it well. - You think it's for that? 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: And that scene describes it well. - You think it's for that?

vlive.korean: 이거 뭘 표현한 건 줄 알아? - 뭔데? You know what it is? - What is that? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “도전! 셉마인드 ②” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: You know what it is? - What is that?

vlive.korean: [쿱스 그림 이해 완료] 약간 그렇게 표현한 거야? [He got what it means] Oh, I understand what you were thinking. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “도전! 셉마인드 ②” (세븐틴 : SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: [He got what it means] Oh, I understand what you were thinking.

vlive.korean: 첫인상이 어땠는지랑 뭘 표현한 거죠? - 뭘 표현한 거죠? What did you express with how his first expression was? - What did you express? 듣기 View video ONEUS : [Full] ONEUS SPECIAL LIVE "FLY WITH US" 1부
vlive.english: What did you express with how his first expression was? - What did you express?

vlive.korean: 아 이거 아기를 발로 표현한 거야? You're expressing an infant with the foot? 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 저세상 텐션 자랑하는 에나스쿨(ft.황신영)에게 참교육 당하는 장기영&김태원<유아인싸>9회
vlive.english: You're expressing an infant with the foot?
